promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic simple butterfly dark-type pokemon with golden wings. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or butterfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Auremoth, a a gigantic simple butterfly dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Surprise Attack. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "butterfly", "dark" or "Auremoth". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, butterfly-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Auremoth thrives in shadowy caverns, fluttering gracefully to launch undetected assaults on foes. Its iridescent wings hypnotize prey, inducing terror.
